response.summary: DevOps Engineer with over 4 years of experience leading digital transformations and DevOps implementation processes in several companies, creating and maintaining Software Development Life Cycles (SDLC) pipelines, On-Premise and cloud infrastructure. Ivan has developed a set of skills that has helped him to achieve goals in the companies he’s worked, such as leadership, mentoring, clear communication and decision making for the soft skills; and hard skills such as development in Terraform, bash scripting and tools and engines such as Jenkins, Azure DevOps, Ansible and Kubernetes, and clouds as AWS and Azure. All of this help him to develop pipelines that was used to disaster recovery applications after a cyber-attack; or to develop pipelines for brand new applications to work in a hybrid environment.
response.skills: SysOps, Microservicios, Plan de recuperación ante desastres, Liderazgo, SonarQube, DevOps, Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, Scrum, Django, Python, Android, Docker, JSON, Linux, Terraform, Android Studio, Servicios web de RESTful, Desarrollo de sitios web, Interfaz de programación de aplicaciones (API)

profile_positions.description:
Lenovo Account
- Managed deployments to production environments using Jenkins for microservices deployed on AWS EKS, having a success rate on 100% without rollbacks.
- Developed Infrastructure as Code for infrastructure related to OpenVPN servers using Terraform and internal Terraform modules provided by the company.
- Managed and updated Linux servers (ubuntu and CentOS based) with security patches and operating system updates. Also, installed monitoring agents and software to fulfill security requirements.

company.name: EPAM Anywhere
company.description:
EPAM Anywhere is a global job platform offering remote work opportunities for tech professionals. 

Discover a few thousand of open remote vacancies within EPAM – one of the most advanced engineering companies in the world.
 
Here, you can build a career around your lifestyle, receiving competitive compensation and access to world-class learning resources while working on projects for global brands and exciting startups. 
 
When you join Anywhere, you become a part of a community of like-minded people who committed to living life on their terms. 

Join us today at anywhere.epam.com. 

____

EPAM Anywhere is a part of EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM). Since 1993, EPAM has leveraged its advanced software engineering heritage to become the foremost global digital transformation services provider – leading the industry in digital and physical product development and digital platform engineering services.
